fields.value: Replication data for: Aggregate Income Shocks and Infant Mortality in the Developing World

publicationCitation.value: Baird, Sarah, Friedman, Jed, and Schady, Norbert, (2011) "Aggregate Income Shocks and Infant Mortality in the Developing World." Review of Economics and Statistics 93:3, 847-856.

files.description: This is the zipped stata data set for the compiled DHS data used in the paper. All basic variables utilized in the do files should be in this data set. Country specific dummies and time trends can be generated from the following code: sort country; egen country_ind=group(country);   local i = 1; while `i' <= `numcountry'{; di "COUNTRY `i'"; gen byte dcountry`i' = 0; replace dcountry`i' = 1 if country_ind == `i'; gen byte tcountry`i' = 0; sum year if country_ind == `i', detail; local yearmin = r(min); local yearmax = r(max); local t = 1; while (`t'<=`yearmax'-`yearmin'+1){; replace tcountry`i'=`t' if (country_ind==`i' & year==`yearmin'+`t'-1); local t = `t'+1; }; local i = `i'+1; };
files.label: RESTAT_data (2).zip

dataFile.description: This is the zipped stata data set for the compiled DHS data used in the paper. All basic variables utilized in the do files should be in this data set. Country specific dummies and time trends can be generated from the following code: sort country; egen country_ind=group(country);   local i = 1; while `i' <= `numcountry'{; di "COUNTRY `i'"; gen byte dcountry`i' = 0; replace dcountry`i' = 1 if country_ind == `i'; gen byte tcountry`i' = 0; sum year if country_ind == `i', detail; local yearmin = r(min); local yearmax = r(max); local t = 1; while (`t'<=`yearmax'-`yearmin'+1){; replace tcountry`i'=`t' if (country_ind==`i' & year==`yearmin'+`t'-1); local t = `t'+1; }; local i = `i'+1; };
